bill.constitutionalAuthorityStatementText: [Congressional Record Volume 163, Number 125 (Tuesday, July 25, 2017)]From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]By Mr. SAM JOHNSON of Texas:H.R. 3386.Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuantto the following:Clause 1 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution, to``provide for the common defense and general welfare of theUnited States.''[Page H6298]

item.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

summary.text:
Improving the Quality of Disability Decisions Act of 2017

This bill directs the Social Security Administration (SSA) to conduct quality reviews of hearing decisions concerning Old Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance or Supplemental Security Income benefits to ensure that administrative law judges are complying with the SSA's regulations.

The SSA must report annually on these quality reviews.

bill.title: Improving the Quality of Disability Decisions Act of 2017

item.title: Improving the Quality of Disability Decisions Act of 2017
To amend titles II and XVI of the Social Security Act to provide for quality reviews of benefit decisions, and for other purposes.
Improving the Quality of Disability Decisions Act of 2017

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
